Packetmaker Module Functions¶

This module contains a few utilities that autogenerate complete simple packets, such as ping and time request packets.

packetmaker.make_ping_packet()¶

Returns a simple ping request packet.

Return type:string
packetmaker.make_time_packet()¶

Returns a simple time request packet.

Return type:string
packetmaker.make_data_packet(data)¶

Compresses sensor data and returns a sensor data packet.

Parameters:data – sensor data
Return type:string
packetmaker.registration_packet()¶

Returns a registration request packet.

Return type:string
